r.s: Find out the minimum version and the extensions required for a piece of code to run
r.d: PHP_CompatInfo will parse a file/folder/script/array to find out the minimum version and extensions required for it to run. Features advanced debug output which shows which functions require which version
r.n: * First release on PEAR-web. * Added the ability to ignore files in parseFolder() and parseArray(), and the ability to ignore folders in parseFolder(). Added the ability to ignore functions in all public methods.
